titles.title: FRAME Act

To amend title 10, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Defense to prescribe regulations to allow emergency response providers to use mobile commissaries or exchange stores deployed to an area covered by a declaration of a major disaster or emergency under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act.
First Responder Access to Mobile Exchanges Act
FRAME Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
First Responder Access to Mobile Exchanges Act or the FRAME Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to allow an emergency response provider (e.g., law enforcement or emergency medical personnel) to use a mobile commissary or exchange store deployed to an area covered by a declaration of a major disaster or emergency.
